  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x21 [bgcolor=#008000] [border: none (1px solid #000000) none]

      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,21) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 274x19
          text run at (0,0) width 274: "There should be a green block above this text"
